subject: Mumbai / Pune Candidates only
msgSnippet: Hi, Please visit our URL http://www.infinixtechnologies.com/careers and apply against the appropriate position. Click on Apply which opens up a Resume Entry
messageBody:
Hi,

Please visit our URL http://www.infinixtechnologies.com/careers and apply against the appropriate position. Click on 'Apply' which opens up a Resume Entry form.

Kindly apply only during office hours i.e. 10:00 am to 7:00 pm (Monday thru Friday)

Regards,

Alvito


Regards,

Alvito
-----------------------------------------------------
Alvito Fernandes
Infinix Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
